mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Mine all Mine" and "Evanston Cross Trail" ROUND DANCES "Spanish Waltz" and "Sandman" Special Features "The Silver Spurs of Spokane, Wash.", "Asilomar August Faculty", "The Caller and Musicians, Chapter IV", "Denver Plans a Festival, "The Decatur Plan for More Square Dancers", "'Kentucky Style' Do Si Do, Style Series", "Do Si Ballonet, Style Series" and "Summer Institutes, 1955". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Women on the Square" "Square Dance Picture", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
